page.title: 06Riding
page.content: I have got my own horse her name is Lucky.Lucky is 13.3 hh.hh means height measurement.You wear jodphurs,a hard hat and boots.When you go out for a ride you should groom the horse and clean out it's feet.We used to have a gymkhana and a rodeo in Blisland.We have got a blacksmith called Harold Rich.I tried once to ride in the hunt but I didn't like it.There are about 35 to 50 people who ride in Blisland.To groom a horse or pony you need a hoofpick,body brush,curry comb ,comb,wisp,stable blanket,water brush,dandy brush,hoof oil,brush and a sweat scraper.Saddlery is very expensive.Trago Mills is one of the cheapest places to get all of the equipment.
